title: Citigroup Chief Financial Officer Mark Mason to Present at the 2020 Morgan Stanley US Financials Conference
summary: New York - Mark Mason, Chief Financial Officer of Citigroup, will present on Wednesday, June 10, 2020. The presentation is expected to begin at approximately 3:15 p.m. New York time. A live webcast will be available at www.citigroup.com/global/investors. A replay and transcript of the webcast will be available shortly after the event.
